website_summaries.verdict: The 27-inch BenQ XL2730Z is a feature-rich gaming monitor offering stellar performance and AMD's FreeSync anti-tearing technology.

customer_reviews.title: The best picture i've seen in a monitor
customer_reviews.text: BenQ have really outdone themselves with this monitor. I have never been so amazed at a picture quality before. Take this as an investment, its build quality is fantastic and the thing looks simple but beautiful. The bezel is thick but the politeness of the logo and gentle glow of the on button are unimposing. The picture quality is stunning, colours are deep and the contrast is exquisite. Absolutely grab this while you can, but a caution, i've got 60hz monitors and they are sluggish compared, you might find yourself getting a couple of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good butwatch the price you may get it cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Had this in my basket and it was reduced to £260 I went to answer the telephone and it was removed from basket as it had went to full price again. I needed the monitor so I just bought it If you are going to buy it put it on your watched list and you may get a bargain. That aside its a good all round monitor for gaming watching movies and dare I say work related activities
customer_reviews.author: Subohm

customer_reviews.title: ... both the Acer tn and ips panels due to terrible backlight bleed and colour banding I opted for this ...
customer_reviews.text: After returning both the Acer tn and ips panels due to terrible backlight bleed and colour banding I opted for this monitor. No Gsync but my 1080ti runs at high framerates so not that fussed. Love this monitor, calibration needed but thats part of the fun.Excellent build quality and fantastic picture. Very very happy and a thumbs up to amazon with the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Roche

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor and comes with dp cable so do not buy one!
customer_reviews.author: dizzyduck

customer_reviews.title: Best part was the box.. but
customer_reviews.text: Helped with them one taps, and im even playing games I never actually thought i would play because of this monitor, the smoothness makes games more enjoyable and helps with control too. The adjusatable stand is amazing too because im a pretty tall guy. Can't wait to try 240hz when i become rich.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrol T.

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've had yet for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: It was this or 4k and I have to say this is much much better. The motion is absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: good machine, takes awhile to set up
customer_reviews.text: took awhile to get the colouring right but once I did, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor 2k 144hz
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Monitor for gaming!!! I love it. Come from 22' and this is a real change. Gaming the image its really smooth. In first moments the colours its not configured, but later adapting the options the image its fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My monitor screen looks like someone has wiped baby wipes over
customer_reviews.text: My monitor screen looks like someone has wiped baby wipes over, picture looks grainy on white background. I've done pretty much every trouble shoot. On the other hand, it's good for gaming 144hz, 1ms... Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: works great at advertised settings
customer_reviews.text: No dead pixels on the brand new monitor, works great at advertised settings. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely screen very clean and tidy and what a difference 144hz makes!
customer_reviews.author: paul wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Other than the horrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 of these monitors, the first had a dead pixel right in the middle and arrived with finger prints on the screen. The second had a stuck pixel just off center to the left and arrived with finger prints on the screen. Other than the horrible quality control, when the display is configured correctly it looks pretty good! Sent both back as I can't stand seeing dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Max Sangster

customer_reviews.title: What are you doing? Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Treated myself to this beast at Christmas and I'm glad I did, my rig has a GTX 1080 and other nice goodies and needed something that I can fully appreciate it with so I went with this, the 144hz refresh rate is such a breath of fresh air compared to your standard 60hz and games like Doom, BF1 etc look absolutely stunning in 1440p. The S switch it comes with is very handy for navigating the monitors options and the USB 3.0 built into the side of the monitor is a nice little touch, I would 101% reccomend this monitor
customer_reviews.author: Zack Walker

customer_reviews.title: The monitor arrived in perfect condition and a little earlier than agreed it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor arrived in perfect condition and a little earlier than agreed it was worth having bought it I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

product_meta.title: BenQ ZOWIE XL2730 27 Inch 144 Hz e-Sports Gaming Monitor with 1 ms, Height Adjustable Stand, S Switch, Black eQualizer, Dark Grey
product_meta.description:
Size Name:27-inch 144 Hz| Style Name:QHD, S Switch, DP| Pattern Name:SingleBenQ ZOWIE XL2730 27-inch 144 Hz e-Sports Monitor (Black eQualiser, Height Adjustable Stand, S-Switch, Colour Vibrance) - Dark Grey.

note: The monitor complies with the pixel error class II according to DIN EN ISO 9241-307



BOX CONTAINS


Zowie by BenQ XL2730
feature_bullets: Adopted worldwide by most professional e-Sports tournaments and players
Built-in black eQualizer colour engine technology brightens dark scenes without over-exposing the bright areas
The effortless one-finger height adjustable stand provides personalized viewing angles
Specially designed frame minimizes visual distractions
Game modes for enhanced gaming experience
